content.raw:
```segway-internal``` is not public, but as per @mlibbrecht :


```
#!html

> Secondly, the pseudocount in this copy of Segway 'for training the mixture distribution weights' is set to 100--is there a particular reason for using 100? For reference, in the copy of GMM on the Segway bitbucket, it is set to 1.

No, we started off with a 100 and just kept it. We planned on testing out different pseudocounts but I don’t think we ever got to it.

I agree with Oscar -- I don't think there was any particular reason for using one value over another.
```
content.html:
segway-internal is not public, but as per @mlibbrecht :

> Secondly, the pseudocount in this copy of Segway 'for training the mixture distribution weights' is set to 100--is there a particular reason for using 100? For reference, in the copy of GMM on the Segway bitbucket, it is set to 1.

No, we started off with a 100 and just kept it. We planned on testing out different pseudocounts but I don’t think we ever got to it.

I agree with Oscar -- I don't think there was any particular reason for using one value over another.
